Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2019...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Kansas City on 3/2/2019 (Going to SLB: P John Kovach. Going to KC: 3B Jose Ferrara)...
Injured on 6/1/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Had first career hit (triple) on 4/14/2022, off Wendell Cox (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2022, off James Kemmer (SEA)...
